title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog, the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo 'Host:'.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog, the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo 'Host:'.
EB: The focus caret should appear in the first Combo 'Host:' when clicked on.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog and press the 'Tab' key. The focus should go to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
